column4: Is it safe to use this repo to install webmin?? deb http://download.webmin.com/download/repository sarge contrib
if you want something like webmin look into ebox which is what ubuntu is replacing webmin with
you would be much better off grabbing a .deb for ubuntu or finding a repo for ubuntu, or just compiling. that repo you have might work, might not, might cause problems
like I said it might be worth looking into ebox which *is* in the repos, both webmin and ebox seem easy to use/learn
